resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74066</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf0aec-5578-4528-2187-8cf44d46ed80#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Margitszigeti korona.</string>
            <string language="en">Crown from Margitsziget</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Krone von Margitsziget</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Couronne de Margitsziget</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coroa de Margitsziget</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parte superiore da Margitsziget</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κορώνα από Margitsziget</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corona de Margitsziget</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Virágos-liliomos díszítésű halotti korona, foglalatos drágakőberakással.</string>
            <string language="en">Funeral crown decorated with flowers and lilies, with socketed precious stone inlaid</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ötvösség,  13.század,  Margitszigeti korona,  V. István király,  halotti korona,  Margitsziget,  domonkos kolostor,  Szent Margit,  Árpád-házi szent,  liliom,  ékkőberakás,  </string>
            <string language="en">goldsmith, 13th century, Crown from Margitsziget, King Stephen V., funeral crown, Margitsziget, black friar monastery, Saint Margaret, saint from Árpád-house, lily, precious stone inlaid</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Begräbnis- Krone verziert mit Blumen und Lilien,
wenn der socketed kostbare Stein eingelegt ist</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Couronne funèbre décorée des fleurs et des lis,
avec la pierre précieuse connectable marquetée</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coroa funeral decorada com flores e lírios, com a
pedra preciosa socketed embutida</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parte superiore funerea decorata con i fiori ed i
gigli, con la pietra preziosa socketed intarsiata</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η νεκρική κορώνα που διακοσμήθηκε με τα λουλούδια και 
τους κρίνους, με ο πολύτιμος λίθος που ενθέθηκε</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corona fúnebre adornada con las flores y los 
lirios, con la piedra preciosa socketed embutida</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Goldschmied, 13. Jahrhundert, Krone von Margitsziget, 
König Stephen V., Begräbnis- Krone, Margitsziget, schwarzer Mönch 
Monastery, Heiliger Margaret, Heiliger von den Árpád-Häusern, 
Lilie, kostbarer Stein eingelegt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">orfèvre, 13ème siècle, couronne de Margitsziget, roi 
Stephen V., couronne funèbre, Margitsziget, monastère de moine 
noir, Saint Margaret, saint des Árpád-maisons, lis, pierre 
précieuse marquetée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">goldsmith, 1ó século, coroa de Margitsziget, rei 
Stephen V., coroa funeral, Margitsziget, monastery do friar preto, 
Saint Margaret, saint das Árpád-casas, lírio, pedra preciosa 
embutida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">orafo, tredicesimo secolo, parte superiore da 
Margitsziget, re Stephen V., parte superiore funerea, Margitsziget, 
monastery del friar nero, San Margaret, san dalle Árpád-case, 
giglio, pietra preziosa intarsiata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χρυσοχόος, 13$ος αιώνας, κορώνα από Margitsziget, King
stephen Θ*Β., νεκρική κορώνα, Margitsziget, μαύρο friar 
μοναστήρι, Αγιος Margaret, Αγιος από το 3αρπ3αδ-σπίτι, 
κρίνος, πολύτιμος λίθος που ενθέτεται</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">orfebre, décimotercero siglo, corona de Margitsziget, 
rey Stephen V., corona fúnebre, Margitsziget, monasterio del friar 
negro, Santo Margaret, santo de las Árpád-casas, lirio, piedra 
preciosa embutida</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>74066</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
